body_html:
I have encounter similar problem in my hackintosh, I am not sure if it is related to SIP, while I am use 0x67 in clover config.

the simplest way is :

export DYLD_LIBRARY_PATH="/usr/local/cuda/lib":$DYLD_LIBRARY_PATH

then everything is fine.
body_text:
I have encounter similar problem in my hackintosh, I am not sure if it is related to SIP,  while I am use 0x67 in clover config.
the simplest way is :

then everything is fine.
body:
I have encounter similar problem in my hackintosh, I am not sure if it is related to SIP,  while I am use 0x67 in clover config.

the simplest way is : 

export DYLD_LIBRARY_PATH="/usr/local/cuda/lib":$DYLD_LIBRARY_PATH

then everything is fine.
